Parameters: The intent to display the +1 confirmation dialog.
onPlusOneClick(android.content.Intent).Description: Called when the +1 button is clicked. Start the intent passed to this method to display the +1 confirmation dialog @B_android#app#Activity_E@ with @B_android#app#Activity#startActivityForResult_E@.

ClassDesc: This is an @B_android#view#View#OnClickListener_E@ that will proxy clicks to an attached @B_com#google#android#gms#plus#PlusOneButton#OnPlusOneClickListener_E@, or default to attempt to start the intent using an @B_android#app#Activity_E@ context. Important: The implementation of @B_android#view#View#OnClickListener#onClick_E@ used by DefaultOnPlusOneClickListener relies on the tag of this class' PlusOneButtonView remaining unused.
